Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the restriction on certain facilities being located within a certain distance from cannabis storefronts
Summary: Restricts cannabis storefronts and premises from being located within 500 feet from child day care centers, public parks and playgrounds; specifies that schools, child day care centers and houses of worship located in a mixed use building shall be included in the restrictions on the locating of cannabis storefronts and premises in relation to such facilities.
LawCode: Amd §§72 & 77, Cannabis L; amd §409, Ed L; amd §390, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law, the education law and the social services law, in relation to restricting cannabis storefronts from being located within a certain distance from child day care centers, public parks and playgrounds and specifying that cannabis storefronts shall be restricted from locating within a certain distance from schools, child day care centers and houses of worship located in a mixed use building
